thread.title: Bachchans, Khans to jazz up Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rukmini Sahay's wedding reception in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Bachchans, Khans to jazz up Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rukmini Sahay's wedding reception in Mumbai - Entertainment

author: Shilpi Sampad
title: Bachchans, Khans to jazz up Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rukmini Sahay's wedding reception in Mumbai
text:
Actor, bride choose European decor, emerald green outfits for wedding reception tomorrow

Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rukmini 
After a fairytale wedding at the Udaipur Palace earlier this month, Neil Nitin Mukesh and Rukmini Sahay are set for a grand reception at a Juhu five-star tomorrow. From the Bachchans to the Khan-daan, the crème de la crème of Bollywood is slated to join the celebrations.
The décor will be European themed, highlighted by white and pink carnations. The hotel's nightclub will be reserved for younger guests while a separate banquet has been booked for celebs to unwind.
"When Neil and Rukmini went to the hotel on Tuesday to supervise the decoration, they ran into Amitabh Bachchan, who blessed them. So, the Bachchans are certain to attend. Bipasha Basu, Karan Singh Grover and Katrina Kaif are also expected," says a source.

Sketches of the outfits 
Designer Manav Gangwani, who has crafted ivory and emerald green outfits for the newly weds from his 2016 Begum-e-Jannat collection, says, "Neil and I share a special friendship, and he has attended quite a few of my shows. So, he always had in mind that I should design his outfits when he gets married. I am delighted to dress him and Rukmini for the reception. We chose emerald green since it is an unusual colour and suits his personality."
The outfits, although primarily traditional, have a modern touch, adds the designer, who had shown three options each to Neil and Rukmini to choose from.
